title: Nebraska
prompt: A weathered farmhouse kitchen table at dawn, scattered with hand-written notes, a cup of coffee, and reading glasses, with soft golden light streaming through a window revealing vast, flat Sandhills grassland beyond. Shot from a low angle emphasizing the worn wood grain and the expansive plains visible through the pane, conveying quiet resilience and the intersection of domestic life with agricultural landscape. Documentary photography style with natural, muted color palette—ochre, sage green, cream—capturing the texture of rural Nebraska without sentimentality.
